ignoreCommand: echo 'Debug Info:'; echo "PR_ID=$VERCEL_GIT_PULL_REQUEST_ID"; echo "Branch=$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF"; if [ "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF" = "feat-next-migration" ]; then echo 'Deploying: dev environment'; exit 1; elif [ -n "$VERCEL_GIT_PULL_REQUEST_ID" ]; then echo 'Deploying: preview environment'; exit 1; else echo 'Skip deployment'; exit 0; fi
